attributes.action: Introduce new tax code for state pensioners with double the personal allowance
attributes.additional_details: We think that people with small private or workplace pensions are currently being taxed unfairly.
attributes.background: We want the government to introduce a new tax code for state pensioners, set at double the basic threshold. If this was implemented, pensioners would receive a higher tax-exempt limit, but wealthier pensioners would still pay tax.
